app.title: Make smarter decisions with our powerful backtesting and filtering tool.
app.description: Backtestor is a comprehensive backtesting and filtering solution designed with ðŸ’– by traders for traders. Crafted with care and attention to detail, Backtestor empowers you to optimize performance and gain a competitive edge in the market.

auth-response.signing-in-message: Please wait while we securely sign you in. You will be redirected to the original page shortly.
auth-response.signin-failed-message: Oops! Something went wrong during the sign-in process. Please try again later or contact support for assistance.

signout-form.signing-out-message: Please wait while we securely sign you out. You will be redirected to the home page shortly.
signout-form.signgout-succeed-message: You have been successfully signed out. Feel free to sign in again when needed.
signout-form.signgout-failed-message: Oops! Something went wrong during the sign out process. Please try again later or contact support for assistance.

index.title: $t(app.title-short)
index.description: Make smarter decisions with our backtesting tool.

auth-response.title: Authentication Callback
auth-response.description: Handle authentication callback for authentication provider integration.

signin.title: Sign in to $t(app.title-short)
signin.description: Sign in to $t(app.title-short) and access your account. Analyze historical data, evaluate strategies, and make smarter decisions.

signout.title: Signing out from $t(app.title-short)
signout.description: Signing out from $t(app.title-short). Please wait while we process your sign out request.

404.title: Page not found - Error 404
404.description: The page you are looking for could not be found. Please check the URL and try again.
404.message: The page you are trying to access does not exist. Please check the URL or navigate back to the home page.
